archimate:Requirement.name: SC-45(2): System Time Synchronization | Secondary Authoritative Time Source
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Identify a secondary authoritative time source that is in a different geographic region than the primary authoritative time source; and (b) Synchronize the internal system clocks to the secondary authoritative time source if the primary authoritative time source is unavailable.

properties.value: It may be necessary to employ geolocation information to determine that the secondary authoritative time source is in a different geographic region.
